notes.text:
An update is now available for Red Hat build of Quarkus.

Red Hat Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability. For more information, see the CVE links in the References section.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
This release of Red Hat build of Quarkus 1.3.4 SP1 includes security updates, bug fixes, and enhancements. For more information, see the release notes page listed in the References section.

Security Fix(es):

* postgresql-jdbc: XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in PgSQLXML(CVE-2020-13692)

* RESTEasy: Caching routes in RootNode may result in DoS (CVE-2020-14326)

For more details about the security issues and their impact, the CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information see the CVE pages listed in the References section.
notes.title: Details

cwe.name: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference

notes.text: A flaw was found in PostgreSQL JDBC in versions prior to 42.2.13. An XML External Entity (XXE) weakness was found in PostgreSQL JDBC. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and system availability.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: postgresql-jdbc: XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in PgSQLXML
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

fixed: Red Hat build of Quarkus 1.3.4 SP1

remediations.details:
Before applying the update, back up your existing installation, including all applications, configuration files, databases and database settings, and so on.

The References section of this erratum contains a download link for the update. You must be logged in to download the update.
product_ids: Red Hat build of Quarkus 1.3.4 SP1

products: Red Hat build of Quarkus 1.3.4 SP1

vulnerabilities.title: postgresql-jdbc: XML external entity (XXE) vulnerability in PgSQLXML

notes.text: A vulnerability was found in RESTEasy, where RootNode incorrectly caches routes. This issue results in hash flooding, leading to slower requests with higher CPU time spent searching and adding the entry. This flaw allows an attacker to cause a denial of service.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: RESTEasy: Caching routes in RootNode may result in DoS
